OOC: heh its Crossroads, not Crossfire =P

--- Crossroads ---

Crossroads replies with confidence, "The shield is quite tough so 
don't worry too much, and it has an additional heat absorbance. 
Just don't mess it up too much, I would like to survive this battle in 
one piece." He chuckles.


On 5 Jun 2001, at 0:20, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> ::::
> 
> "Uh huh... AH!" Whatever the drunk was going to say to Crossfire was
> cut short as Arty's blasts hit him in the back, almost slamming him
> into the wall. He spins around, his back dented, growling. Running
> toward Arty, the drunk fires two missiles at him.
> 
> "How much firepower can to take?" he asks the shield while charging at
> Arty.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Arty had just gotten free when another slab was flopped on top of
> > him. His servos were damaged so he couldn't find the leverage he
> > needed to push it back off. He tried to aim his cannons knowing that
> > he was as good as trapped but couldn't get an angle to aim at
> > Pacifix. His eyes saw the drunk, his cannons turned and aimed, the
> > tip started to glow and Arty fired both barrels at full power at the
> > drunks back.
> 
> 
>
